The correct chronological order of the events is: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6
Firstly, the blue-branded intro shows a cartoon in a Marvel shirt while the host welcomes viewers back to “Chelsea News”. This event happens first.
Secondly, a close-up of a player in red-and-black stripes is shown as the host talks about a possible return if another team gets relegated. This event comes next.
Thirdly, a Fabrizio Romano tweet about Ben Chilwell wanting Chelsea and Tagliafico as backup appears while the host explains Lampard’s priority at left-back. This event follows the previous one.
Fourthly, a Squawka comparison graphic between Ben Chilwell and Nicolás Tagliafico is displayed as the host says Tagliafico’s defensive metrics are stronger and Chilwell’s attacking ones are better. This event takes place after the previous one.
Fifthly, Headlines from outlets like The Express/Metro/CaughtOffside appear as the host calls Kai Havertz one of the most versatile forwards. This event comes last.
Lastly, the end screen with “CLICK HERE TO SUBSCRIBE” appears as a rap track starts playing. This event marks the end

The correct sequence is: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6
The first visual element is the host on the blue "FOOTBALL THERAPY" background, wrapping up an early segment. This is followed by images of players in blue as he discusses potential transfers such as Pedro going to Roma and both himself and Willian potentially leaving. Then, there's a close-up of a red-and-black striped player as he talks about a possible return to the team if another team is relegated. Concurrently, a tweet from Simon Phillips appears on the left side of the screen, and the host continues discussing transfer rumors. Next, a tweet from Fabrizio Romano about Ben Chilwell and Tagliafico appears, and the host承诺更新这两个球员的情况。 Finally, a brief upbeat theme jingle plays, concluding the segment.
